history.action: üîç T+38H POST-IMPLEMENTATION QUALITY CHECKPOINT (C612) ‚Äî Fifth QA cycle post-npm-live. Verified quality after two major Sprint 2 PRs (C603 heat-retrieval, C609 reflexion-core). All gates clear: TypeCheck 0, Lint 0, 1,294 tests passing (405 CLI + 889 Core), +74 tests since C602. Skipped tests analyzed (10 total, all intentional). R-013: 52/52 tracked. Created docs/qa/t38h-post-implementation-quality-checkpoint-c612.md. 192 consecutive (C421-612). QA: IMPLEMENTATION VELOCITY VERIFIED.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Post-implementation verification after major PRs catches quality drift early. Delta tracking (+74 tests) validates engineering is maintaining test discipline. Lesson: L297 ‚Äî Post-implementation QA cycles should measure test delta, not just absolute counts; +74 tests across 2 PRs shows healthy test-to-code ratio for Sprint 2 velocity.
